title: Differentiated Caseflow Management
description: A comprehensive case management system designed to streamline legal workflows, track case progress, and manage documentation efficiently with role-based access control.

title: Double Blind Token System
description: Eliminating corruption in government services through technology and transparency. A production-ready, open-source platform that revolutionizes government service delivery by ensuring complete anonymity between citizens and officers. Built to prevent bribery and corruption through innovative double-blind encryption and AI-powered automation.

title: Generative UI for Accessibility
description: An AI-powered system that generates accessible user interfaces dynamically, ensuring WCAG compliance and improving web accessibility for users with disabilities.

title: Job Recommendation System
description: An intelligent job matching platform using machine learning algorithms to recommend personalized job opportunities based on skills, experience, and preferences.
